item.title: Alas, it was not to be
item.description: My jQuery bug was already documented. :(

item.title: jQuery UI Bug - 1.8.16, buttonset() method
item.description: I love to find bugs in good software! Came across a little jQuery UI bug today. It’s for one browser, but it always excited to be able to create an easy-to-replicate bug. The bug is small - it deals with the buttonset() method. The buttons, instead of having the rounded corners on the outside, have the rounded corners on the inside. Not critical but it made the UI I was working on look strange.
